name: Greg Alyn Carlson
description:
Agents shot and killed a man believed to be one of the FBI's Ten Most Wanted Fugitives in North Carolina on Wednesday. Medical examiners must determine if the suspect was Greg Alyn Carlson. He was wanted for multiple armed sexual assaults. (Feb. 14)
